name: Symphony
description: Symphony requires participants to control a musical fountainÂ’s water flow and lights, so that the fountain dances to the tunes of the music

name: Foxhunt
description: Foxhunt, is a fun filled package on the lines of a traditional English activity involving tracking and chasing a fox by trained hounds.

name: Trade Off
description: This event challenges you to solve basic analog and digital problems at the lowest level of abstraction in the most intuitive manner

name: Simplicity
description: It is a day long an signal processing basd online event (hackerrank) which tests the skill of the participants.

name: Trailblazer
description: It is a simple event based on the line follower robotics. You are required to build a line follower robot.

name: Automata
description: This is an ultimate image processing event in which the participants build an autonomous robot and guide it, with only the help of images acquired from an overhead camera.

name: Waltz
description: It is the one of a kind event where the robot follows the wall according the problem statement and solves the maze given by the committee.
